description: These lightened up banh mi sandwiches are packed with quick pickled veggies and flavour.
name: Turkey Meatball Banh Mi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot, peeled and sliced into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the cabbage and carrot in lime juice in a large bowl and set aside for 15-20 minutes.
Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and add meatballs. Cook for 7-8 minutes until browned and cooked through.
Whisk the soy sauce, ginger and remaining sesame oil together in a large bowl, stir in the spring onions and cooked meatballs and toss to coat.
Cut each baguette in half and slice open lengthways. Spread with mayonnaise, add the meatball and spring onion mix, top with quick pickled vegetables and serve.
